Row.Text: "The sea calmed and the whirlwind and flood stopped.[NEWLINE]Utnapishtim opened a window and felt fresh air on his face.[NEWLINE]He looked for coastlines at the horizon and saw a region of land.[NEWLINE]The boat lodged firmly on mount Nimush which held the boat for several days, allowing no swaying.[NEWLINE]He released a raven which was able to eat and scratch, and did not circle back to the boat.[NEWLINE]He then sent his livestock out in various directions."
"천만에! 바이슨 1달러가 곧[NEWLINE] 영국의 5파운드와 맞먹게 될거야[NEWLINE] 내가 영국 여왕을 납치하고 나면...[NEWLINE]영국 은행은 그걸 환율 시세로 잡을수 밖에 없을걸"[NEWLINE]-M. 바이슨
